name: Flick Erasers Battle Royale
description:
Flick Erasers has become a battle royale!
Cross from desk to desk in a bid to survive!
Victory is within your grasp!!

[Battle]
Choose your favorite map and play alone or with friends!

[Online]
Connect with faraway friends from around the world in a battle royale!
Queue up for a Quick Match to increase your rating and victory count!

[Eraser Shop]
Accumulate points and collect over 100 eraser types!

[Mission]
Complete difficult challenges and earn special erasers!
intro:
It's a classwide eraser battle!
Be the last one surviving!
Get ready for a battle royale right on your desk!
